findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Users have to pay attention to the owner privileges that have total control over users' tokens.

findings.title: Multisig owner account
findings.description: The contract owner has rights to lock tokens on any user account using function `_lock()`, unlock tokens from any account using functions `unlock()` and `unlockAll()`, burn tokens from any user account using functions `burn()`, and mint tokens to any account using functions `_mint()`.

findings.title: Crosschain address collisions
findings.description: It is possible that a transaction can be sent to the address of your contract at another chain (as a result of a user mistake or some software fault). It is recommended that you deploy a 'mock contract' that would allow you to withdraw any tokens from that address or prevent any funds deposits.
